title: Guy, Susan Beesley: Couple from Willung, Victoria missing since Monday
text:
Although most people reported missing are found alive and well, there remains around 2000 missing long-term.

A Victorian couple missing since Monday afternoon told family they were driving home through the high country but never arrived.

Guy Beesley, 70, and his wife Susan Beesley, 69, were last seen leaving an address in Whiteheads Creek near Seymour about noon on Monday.

They made contact with family at about 8.30am that day to advise they were intending to drive via the alpine town of Dinner Plain to Willung, southeast of Traralgon.

The pair were “bound for their home in Willung” and are believed to have been travelling in their white 2016 Land Rover Discovery wagon with the registration AJT 166, police said.

Senior Sergeant Mark Hesse told reporters today there is no indication of foul play.

“Given we can only track them back to 3.30pm on Monday, it’s starting to become quite concerning,” he said, Seven News reports.

“The sooner (we find the couple) the better.”

Police and family are worried as their disappearance is considered “out of character”.

Mr Beesley is caucasian and described as being bald with blue eyes, about 175cm tall and of a medium build. He was last seen wearing dark-coloured clothing.

Ms Beesley is also caucasian and described as having shoulder-length straight blonde hair with a front fringe, hazel eyes, about 165cm tall and also of a medium build.

She was last seen wearing a rust-coloured T-shirt, skinny jeans and a black zip-up jacket with a grey quilted collar.

Anyone who sees Guy or Susan, spots their Land Rover vehicle or who knows of their whereabouts is urged to contact Benalla Police Station on 03 5760 0200.

Alerts about their disappearance have been shared thousands of times on social media.

“Love u guys l want you home safe soon,” Rayleen Morrow commented on one post.
description: A Victorian couple missing since Monday afternoon told family they were driving home through the high country but never arrived.
